topic: Catalytic mechanisms and reactivity of surface-supported metal species in C-H bond activation, H/D exchange, and alkane metathesis reactions
QuestionEnglish: Compare and contrast the preparation, structure, and catalytic properties of silica-supported zirconium hydrides and alumina-supported thorium hydrides in C-H bond activation reactions, detailing their mechanisms in H/D exchange and alkane metathesis. Include discussions on reaction rates, selectivity, and the roles of σ-bond metathesis, hydrogenolysis, and chain walking in these processes.
QuestionChinese: 比较并对比二氧化硅负载的锆氢化物和氧化铝负载的钍氢化物在C-H键活化反应中的制备、结构和催化性能，详细说明它们在氢/氘交换和烷烃复分解中的机理。包括讨论反应速率、选择性以及σ键复分解、氢解和链行走在这些过程中的作用。
